parameters:
\N<Luda Soldier>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants shall not proceed any further.
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
weather : 0 : 5 : 5 : 15 : 1 : Light_01D : 1
weather : 1 : 5 : 5 : 5 : 1 : Light_01C : 1
air06
air05
\N<Yuia>...

\N<Segi>Lord Yuia, Riia and I will be waiting outside. We pray for
your safety...
\N<Yuia>Yeah... Thank you. I'm sure everything will go well.
\N<Segi>But...

\N<Yuia>No need to worry. They say I'm too optimistic, but in the
end, all we need to do is keep winning.

\N<Yuia>As long as I continue to win the matches, both my safety and
yours are guaranteed. That's the bare minimum rule of this
vile tournament.

\N<Yuia>Otherwise, the warriors wouldn't be able to exhibit their
full power... It's a cliché from the Luda soldiers, but
well, in times like these, I'll trust their words.
\N<Yuia>So... it's okay, no need to worry.
セギ_笑い2
\N<Segi>...Yes.
\N<Luda Soldier>You there, what are you doing. Clear the way.

\N<Segi>Wh-What's going on...? The Luda soldiers have suddenly
started moving urgently...

\N<Yuia>Probably... the arrival of the new commander from the main
Luda forces that was supposed to be assigned here.
\N<Segi>Ah!!
\N<Yuia>Segi... what's wrong?
\N<Segi>L-Lord Yuia... that...!
\N<Yuia>Could it be...
\N<Zuuteruka>...

\N<Yuia>Zuuteruka... No mistake. His appearance has changed, but
that's definitely Zuuteruka...

\N<Yuia>Why is he here... Could it be that he's the commanding
officer stationed in this town...?
\N<Segi>Th-That's... What should we do...

\N<Yuia>It's fine... It's been years since then. Even he must have
forgotten our faces by now.

\N<Yuia>Besides... he wouldn't expect us to be here. There's no way
he'll notice us.
\N<Segi>I hope you're right...
\N<Yuia>...

\N<Yuia>...It's okay, just stay calm. If we act rashly, we'll only
make things worse.
\N<Segi>Y-Yes...
\N<Yuia>...

\N<Segi>He's gone... It's true... It seems like he didn't notice us
at all.
\N<Yuia>Right? To him, it was nothing more than a trivial incident.
\N<Yuia>For us... it was like a nightmare we can't forget.
\N<Segi>...
\N<Yuia>...It's time, let's go.
\N<Segi>Yes... Lord Yuia, please be extra careful...
DW_目標設定 Waiting_for_Yuia's_match_results
A
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>

\N<Irime>Hey, Segi. Is Yuia-san also heading to a match now? Well, as
you can see, I'm about to head out myself.

\N<Segi>...Is that so. Um... I'm not sure what to say at a time like
this...

\N<Irime>Hehe, looks like I've made you worry unnecessarily before
your beloved husband's match.

\N<Irime>It's okay, there's no need for any words now. I'll
definitely win and survive. At this point, all I can do is
believe in my own strength.
\N<Segi>Yes... Please be safe.
A

\N<Irime>Hey, Segi. Is Yuia-san also heading to a match now? Well, as
you can see, I'm about to head out myself.

\N<Segi>...Is that so. Um... I'm not sure what to say at a time like
this...

\N<Irime>Hehe, looks like I've made you worry unnecessarily before
your beloved husband's match.

\N<Irime>It's okay, there's no need for any words now. I'll
definitely win and survive. At this point, all I can do is
believe in my own strength.
\N<Segi>Yes... Please be safe.
<ActiveMessage:\C[1]■EV発生■>
\N<Rame>Segi-san... I-I'm worried...

\N<Rame>Of course, I trust Mama, and she laughs saying there's no
need to worry... but still, I can't help but feel anxious...

\N<Rame>Because... everyone fighting here has the same strong
resolve as Mama...

\N<Riia>Ahaha... Rame-chan, you're being silly. You're shaking like
a baby.

\N<Rame>What do you mean... You wouldn't understand, Riia-kun,
you're just a child!

\N<Riia>There you go again! Calling me a child! You're not that much
different yourself!
\N<Segi>Stop it, Riia.

\N<Segi>...You're right, it's worrying. But you know, I feel the
same way...?
\N<Rame>You do, Segi-san...?
\N<Segi>Yes, so let's pray together. That Mama comes back safely.
\N<Rame>Yes...
A
\N<Rame>Miss Segi... I-I'm worried...

\N<Rame>Of course, I trust Mama, and she laughs saying there's no
need to worry... but still, I can't help but feel anxious...

\N<Rame>After all... everyone fighting here has the same strong
determination as Mama...

\N<Segi>...You're right, it is worrying. But you know, I feel the
same way...?
\N<Rame>You too, Miss Segi...?
\N<Segi>Yes, so let's pray together. That Mama comes home safely.
\N<Rame>Yes...

\N<Man>To win in the training tournament, strength is obviously
necessary, but knowledge of your opponents is also
essential. It's not so sweet that you can win through mere
brute force alone.
